name: 15 Defense
description: Fight them all! This game gets you plunged into a tough fight on the bottom of some imaginary sea. Watch it out, enemies never sleep! Resist their attacks and improve your survival time by upgrading your skills and talents. The game is aimed at a wide audience. It can be played occasionally, for killing time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98 and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 80 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
